author: xtqqczze
body:
## PR Summary

* Use `[DateTime:]::UtcNow` instead of `[DateTime]::Now`.
* Use `[DateTimeOffset]` instead of `[DateTime]` when appropriate.
* Various style changes.

## PR Context  
`DateTime` is not fully timezone aware which could cause an operation to fail.

Reference: [Performing arithmetic operations with dates and times](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/standard/datetime/performing-arithmetic-operations).
